content:
Hello, Do you have the Daily installed already and you want to move to the stable version or do you want to install the stable only?

If it's the latter 1. Visit https://www.thunderbird.net/ 2. Click the download button.

If you are using Linux for example you also could use https://flathub.org/apps/org.mozilla.Thunderbird or follow the instruction of your OS.
creator: shopov.bogomil

content: I have had good success for CSV by first creating an exported CSV from thunderbird, using it as a template. Then adjusting the other CSV file to mirror the first line and then the file imports easily.
creator: davidsk

content: Add Google Contacts: in Address Book tab, New Address Book, Add CardDAV Address Book, enter the gmail account email, enter the account password in the OAuth window to allow access (if necessary), add Contacts. After that, File/New/Calendar..., On the Network, enter the gmail account email (leave the location box empty), Find Calendars, add the Birthdays calendar.
creator: sfhowes

content: This message comes from Google, not from Thunderbird. It happens because your Thunderbird seems to have a Gmail account and is attempting to log in.
creator: davidsk

content:
Hi, In order to do that, there is a little trick. 1. Right click on the message and select "Edit as a new Message" 2. Then File->Print 3. Et voilà

There are also settings on the print dialogue to enable background printing if you want to make it beautiful.
creator: shopov.bogomil

content: Set View/Headers to Normal. Press Alt if the Menu Bar with View is hidden.
creator: sfhowes

content:
Hi, There is no easy way to change that, but here is a trick on how you can do it.

1. Click on settings 2. Scroll down the "general" settings page to the bottom 3. Click on the "Config editor" 4. Accept the warning 5. In the search field find "layout.css.devPixelsPerPx" 6. the default value is -1.0 7. Click on the value and change it to say 1.3 and you will see the changes immediately.

I hope that helps!

P.S You can play with View->Density together with this setting to make it as you wish.
creator: shopov.bogomil

content:
Zkus spustit Thunderbird v Režimu řešení potíží (přes nabídku Nápověda) - nic nezaškrtávej. Pak zkus Thunderbird ukončit. Pokud se TB ukončí hned, projdi si rady na odkazu.

  • Mám u účtů zapnutou údržbu složek při ukončení a vymazání všech košů.

Má to nějaký speciální význam dělat údržbu složek a mazání košů při každém zavření Thundebirdu?
creator: poljos-moz

content: V režimu řešení potíží problém trvá. Zkusil jsem u všech 4 nastavených účtů vypnout vysypání koše i údržbu složek, a Thunderbird se ukončí, ale když je zase zapnu problém je zpět. Při postupném přidávání úkolů při skončení snese maximálně vysypání koše u max. tří účtů. Když přidám vysypání u dalšího účtu nebo údržbu složku, už zůstane viset.
creator: BunnyHop

content: Za jak dlouho se to ukončí, když počkáš? Kolik procesů (možná zbytečných) ti běží na pozadí? Jak velkou máš RAM? Ale to jsou otázky na HW a SW v počítači. To tady nevyřešíme.
creator: poljos-moz

content: Jde pravděpodobně o bug v Thunderbirdu, již jsem poslal hlášení na bugzillu.
creator: BunnyHop

content:
Spam first defense frankly is best handled by the mail provider, so your choice of mail provider determines how much spam you are going to see in your mail client.

For spam reduction, gmail is an excellent choice. I also find fastmail to be excellent.

In both cases, you can still use Thunderbird.
creator: wsmwk

content: Grazie della risposta. essendo un po' smanettone ho fatto una piccola hackerata, avendo ancora cercato soluzioni ma senza trovare una via e sempre con lo stesso errore. sono andato in C:\Users\username\AppData\Roaming\Thunderbird\Profiles\ueznzhbg.default-release\Mail e ho in pratica duplicato una cartella che avevo e funzionava no problem ho cambiato nome alla cartella copiata con il nome della nuova mail ho aperto TBird, e' apparso tutto al posto giusto senza problemi, ho cancellato le mail che erano presenti (che sono quelle del account ricopiato) et voila'. tutto funzionante no problem. unica cosa che non ho capito e' che quando sono andato in configurazione account, per cambiare i pop e smtp, erano gia' quelli nuovi della della nuova mail. non capisco come e' successo, ma alla fine meglio cosi'. grazie ancora della risposta.
creator: gianvigalta

content:
Vai in Tasto menu > Visualizza > Cartelle e spunta la voce Tutte le cartelle A questo punto la cartella archivio ricompare?

Inoltre, se non lo avessi già fatto, fai subito un backup del profilo -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/profili-thunderbird#w_effettuare-una-copia-di-sicurezza-del-profilo

p.s. Tasto menu è il pulsante con le tre linee orizzontali che si trova di solito in alto a destra.

content: Your email provider probably has a phone number because you are probably paying for the service. Thunderbird, on the other hand, is free and does not have a support number. So, if you post full screenshots of SMTP settings and also one of incoming settings, someone here may have suggestions. Thank you.
